app_name: OrganizEat: cookbook recipe box organizer & keeper
app_detail:
Need a Better Way to Organize Your Recipes? As featured on Martha Stewart magazine: 
Many recipe-organizing apps make you manually enter a recipe, but not this one. Just snap a picture of a recipeâ€”whether itâ€™s the card your grandmother wrote out her famous cookie recipe on a page from Sundayâ€™s paper â€” and OrganizEat will store that recipe alongside ones you found online.

Use this recipe keeper app, in order to eliminate those stacks of cookbooks and recipe organizers from your kitchen. You donâ€™t need them anymore, when you store your favorite recipes in the OrganizEat Recipe Organizer app. This handy recipe box app lets you keep all your favorite culinary recipes, organized right on your phone. Use this app to keep Grandma's secret paprika meatballsÂ rrecipe stored, or use it to organize your own custom recipes. And the good news is: No Typing! This recipe manager app doesnâ€™t require you to type in your recipes, on this tiny little screen of your mobile phone. Instead you simply snap a photo of your recipe and it's ready for you to view. 

OrganizEat recipe organizer, also allows clipping recipes from the web, by supporting directly importing recipes from more than 150 popular websites, including Allrecipes, Food Network, Food.com, Delish and many more. Check out the full list here: 
https://bit.ly/2JCC8yD 
OrganizEat lets you create your own digital cookbook by gathering recipes on the web and using the recipe import feature. It is you and your own recipes! The recipes that YOU like and wish to save! 

This recipe manager app keeps your recipes organized by category, and you can tag each dish for easy searching. It is the practical recipe keeper app, that will keep your recipes in a perfect order. You will be able to view your recipes everywhere on your phone or your tablet. You can add your own photo, add tags for better organization, and add you own comments. This is the ultimate digital cookbook version of the good old recipe box. Not somebody elseâ€™s recipes, but YOUR OWN recipes!

Recipe Organizer by OrganizEat features:
Â· Enter each recipe into the app by snapping a photo - no need to type!
Â· Save recipes from the web automatically - more than 150 popular sites supported!
Â· Backup your recipes and sync them across all your devices!
Â· A cloud server account that supports Android, iPhone and iPad devices - all in one.
Â· Organize every recipe by folders
Â· Add searchable tags to easily find your favorite dish. 
Â· Multiple tags search is also supported!
Â· Add your own pictures to each recipe
Â· Email recipes to friends and family
Â· Add notes and tags to organize better
Â· View your recipes full screen while cooking
Â· Screen that stays on while you cook, to avoid touching it with greasy hands

But itâ€™s not just Martha Stewart who loved OrganizEat recipe manager. See what our iOS version users have to say:

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Worth every penny! (by Embuglmnop)
I finally found an app that makes it easy to store all my recipes. I love it.

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ OrganizEat (by Jode634)
Love this app and the Facebook posts with updates about features. Not looking through screenshots anymore to find recipes Iâ€™ve saved and want to try

ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºÂ So easy to useÂ (byÂ Reeny 74)
A great app for keeping all your recipes in one place

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Fantastic!!! (by KayyEllie)
Incredibly easy and well thought out! I love it and use it daily!

Download the free OrganizEat app today, and give it a try! 
Visit our website http://app.organizeat.com to learn more, or checkout our Facebook page where you can read our users feedback: https://bit.ly/2GOFoF5

Disclaimer: the free trial version of OrganizEat allows saving up to 20 recipes. In order to save more recipes, after the free trial quota is over: an upgrade for the Full Version is required.

Keywords: cook, cooking, recipe box, recipe manager, recipe keeper, organizer, holder, taste, my cookbook, clipping, save, importing, management, recipe storing, organize, photo, picture, ocr
